title: The study mood? Where are you? 🙂😌☕️

comments.body:
the study mood? nigga that left the chat the moment you opened reddit.

sitting there with that empty glass like you're pondering life, but really just wondering if osmosis works for exams.

good luck tho, you'll need a miracle bigger than your procrastination.
My "study mood" hasn't existed since March 2020.
Somebody needs to connect to those high voltage lines in the college to jump start "study mood" atp

Me here since 2024

Fells like I'm in a rat race
That's because you are in a rat race. Everything in this country feels like one—first it was board exams, then JEE, and now it's about chasing the highest GPA and landing the best job.
hey, thanks for the pep talk—I’ll be sure to credit you in my thesis on ‘The Art of Procrastination and the People Who Write Essays About It for Free.‘
Exams done! Study mood never came🥱
